title: Memoirs of the life and writings of Thomas Chalmers...
author: Hanna, William
snippet: Got on to Ruthwell after four.

title: Memoirs of the life and writings of Thomas Chalmers...
author: Hanna, William
snippet: On reaching Dumfries I found Dr. Thomas Duncan, his brother Henry of Ruthwell, whom you have seen, and Mr. Clyde, waiting me at the inn.

title: The complete works of Robert Burns.
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: A night or two before Burns left Brow, he drank tea with Mrs. Craig, widow of the late minister of Ruthwell.
